title: Airborne particulate matter integral assessment in Magdalena department, Colombia: Patterns, health impact, and policy management
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Eliana Vergara-Vásquez, Luis M. Hernández Beleño, Tailin T. Castrillo-Borja, Tomás R. Bolaño-Ortíz, Yiniva Camargo-Caicedo, Andrés M. Vélez-Pereira
